name: @tag tagging in note text (experimental)
description: With this script you can store your tags in your note-text. Use tags like @tag or @tag_one for 'tag one' inside your note-text to tag your notes. You can change '@' to something else in script settings. You also are able to use the functionality of the QOwnNotes user-interface to tag with this tags inside your note texts, like for adding a tag to the current note as well as bulk operations for adding and removing tags to your note. If you rename a tag inside QOwnNotes the text-tags in your notes are also updated. You can also use this script as template for implementing your own, unique tagging mechanism. If you install this script you will loose all links between notes and tags and instead your in-note tags will be used! This functionality is still experimental! Please report your experiences.
